title: Gambling Week: Early look at Week 1 lines, how to bet Chiefs-Texans opener (Football 9/4)
description:
To wrap up Gambling Week, Will Brinson welcomes Kenny White to break down Week 1 spreads. The 2020 opener is now less than a week away as the Chiefs have been getting all the hype, but Kenny says don't sleep on the Texans and the "revenge factor". The guys also get into another big Week 1 matchup: Cowboys vs. Rams. Will Sean McVay and Jared Goff be able to set the tone early and bounce back after a down 2019? More likes and leans follow as Will and Kenny tackle the other primetime and standout games from the first slate of football!
